The rally was driven by strong BNB Chain activity, rising institutional treasury demand, and widespread bullish sentiment. Daily trading volume soared above $5 billion, underscoring robust market conviction. Base App features a social feed, real-time token trading, mini-apps, messaging, and smart wallets compatible across apps and chains. The goal is to make on-chain activity as seamless as any mainstream application. The sale was part of the investorâ€™s estate planning strategy, with Galaxy executing multiple block trades and transferring much of the BTC directly to exchanges. Despite the scale, the market absorbed the move with only a modest, short-term decline before Bitcoin prices rebounded.
